data.question: Click on the measures that can prevent aggressive driving.
answers: Stay calm, relaxed and focused on driving safely
Don’t take frustrations out on fellow motorists
Display a peace sign on your car bumper
Leave plenty of room between you and other motorists
Drive with your radio turned up loud so the other motorist can enjoy it
Drive in the right hand slow lane if you are driving slower than the traffic
Keep updated on world news events
Use your turn signals Plan ahead and don’t speed
